TopicTitle: Modding Monday: VOID - Vessel Orbital Informational Display

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_n1jd08BYxL1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/7a52def43273c7f8d7c09bbee05fecfb/tumblr_inline_n1je2poxwO1rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p>Info, info and more info, all at your fingertips. Thanks to <strong>toadicus</strong>' <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54533-0-23-VOID-Vessel-Orbital-Informational-Display"><strong>VOID</strong></a>, you can pull up highly detailed information on orbital mechanics, flight conditions, transfer maneuvers *and much more when you need it most. There’s so much info to take in that your head may explode at a single glance. The good part, though, is that while your head may explode, the details in <strong>VOID</strong> may well help keep your ships from doing the same.</p>

<p>Click <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54533-0-23-VOID-Vessel-Orbital-Informational-Display"><strong>HERE</strong></a> to find out more details on <strong>VOID</strong>.</p>
I swear I didn't see this before. But anyway, this is an AWESOME mod!
